metadata.title: CVE-2024-51486 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Ampache is a web based audio/video streaming application and file manager.The vulnerability exists in the interface section of the Ampache menu,where users can change the "Custom URL?-?Favicon". This section is notproperly sanitized, allowing for the input of strings that can executeJavaScript. This issue has been addressed in version 7.0.1 and all usersare advised to upgrade. There are no known workarounds for thisvulnerability.

criterions.comment: ampache package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
